title: Blacked out honor
body: How come when i go to my friends profile page on the client there honor level is blacked out? is there a upcoming feature that will implement this or is it just there to be there? Here is a picture of what im talking about if your clueless: http://imgur.com/a/jW81g

replies.body:
Hello there.

So Riot confirmed that this is actually a bug. They will make it so that if you are lvl 3+ it will appear in your profile for everyone to see. I am not sure if they will leave it this way for lvl2- or they will just remove it and it will look like the old one.

P.S. 0 rp? How?
That's interesting. Mind sharing the source of that?

> [{quoted}](name=Simurgh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=l3xTFQnI,comment-id=00360000,timestamp=2017-07-01T20:06:28.610+0000)
>
> There a bug right now where you can't see other people's honor levels at all. In the future, you should be able to see the Honor level of players that are level 3+

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/l3xTFQnI-lets-chat-about-honor?comment=00360000

I'm quite curious how they know theres a bug with honour levels displaying in the first place, if only levels 3+ are even supposed to be visible. AFAIK everyone is still level 2 (or maybe lower), so there'd be no level 3's to see to test.

Simurgh and I are on the same team that developed the feature, is how they know :) Right now that's intended functionality, and as mentioned in the other post, we have future plans to show more honor info in other player's profiles.

I mean, I realise you guys are the ones who would know if you'd looked into it and discovered the bug, I was just surprised it was something looked into and discovered at this stage. 

I would've figured that at the point it went live it was believed to be hopefully bug free as far as you guys knew, and then we'd only discover that bug once players started getting level 3 and it wasn't showing up, instead of being discovered in a matter of days (or less if you knew before it even went live). Guess y'all are just really on the ball with post launch review and/or discovered it before it went live, and just figured it wasn't important enough to warrant delaying the launch (which I agree with).

Yeah, we knew about it before going live {{champion:32}} . Like you said + based on how long we expected level ups to take + what we expected the functionality to be, we made the call to address it later.

0 rp because other accounts are banned (am reformed) dont feel like spending money on this forsaken game anymore unless its a singed skin. Thanks for your reply too, i was confused why it was blacked out!

No problem. I love to help. 

But the thing about this 0 rp was "How did you manage to do so? What did you buy? A lot of peolpe get leftovers."

Edit: And now it comes the time when you remember that people don't start with 400 rp any more. My bad. Sorry :D
